import React from 'react' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { Link, Navigate } from 'react-router-dom' import api from '../../http' import { logout } from '../../store/actionCreator' import styles from "./style.module.css" const Home = () => { const user = useSelector(state => state.user) const error = useSelector(state => state.error) const dispatch = useDispatch() const sendActivation = (id) => { api.post(`/activate/send/${id}`) } return ( user.isAuth ?

Ваш профиль

{user.name}

ID: {user.id}

Email: {user.email}

Аккаунт: {user.isActivated ? "активирован" : "не активирован"}

Другие пользователи Чаты {error.type != "unauthorized" ? error.message : ""}
: ) } export default Home
